alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:44PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Tehama and northwestern Glenn Counties through 645 PM PDT... At 543 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northwest of Alder Springs, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Tehama and northwestern Glenn Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County
